document.full_text: wearing neon colors, dancing and flashing "i vote" signs for video cameras, students in canada's capital on monday joined a growing movement of youth "vote mobs" aimed at shaking up the may 2 national election.
document.title: canada student mobs aim to make voting go viral
lines_and_colors: wearing neon colors, dancing and flashing "i vote" signs for video cameras, students in canada's capital on monday joined a growing movement of youth "vote mobs" aimed at shaking up the may 2 national election.
